author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Use CMSHadronPhysicsFTFP_BERT in all the physics lists of type FTFP_BERT (not the HP ones) and use the parameter setting for pions

#### PR validation:

Use runTheMatrix.py to test this

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim68 Use CMSHadronPhysics_FTFP_BERT in all FTFP_BERT* physics lists
